dialogues.speaker: Master Agnus
dialogues.message: It is done! The curse has been lifted, and the undead have been vanquished!

dialogues.speaker: Master Agnus
dialogues.message: Leon, you have proven yourself to be the true savior of our people. Without your bravery and dedication, we would have been lost. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart. With pride, I name you as the Guardian of Sylvanleaf Haven.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: It was my honor, Master Agnus. I will always protect Sylvanleaf Haven from any threat that may arise.

dialogues.speaker: Master Agnus
dialogues.message: When you're ready to sleep, head back into the village...I believe there's something waiting for you
